segments.text: I see the water streaming down the cabinets, glistening in the light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so peaceful at first glance, but it’s a warning sign of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the indoor tumult captures my attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet no one seems to acknowledge the chaos; it’s almost infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how the woman must feel if she ever discovers this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, on the other hand, are caught up in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their laughter must feel like a rebellion against the mundane chores inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
